item.title: Stagecoach founder Souter hits out at 'risk-averse attitude'
item.author: The Herald
item.description:
SIR Brian Souter has lamented a "risk-averse attitude all around us" that is holding back wealth and business creation.
The high-profile entrepreneur, who founded Stagecoach with sister Dame Ann Gloag in 1980 and steered the company to its sale to DWS of Germany in 2022, has questioned whether the ...
